name: Orake 2D MMORPG
description: Orake is a new 2D MMORPG, In Orake you can party up with your friends or make a clan. You can play mini-games, engage in clan fights, boss fights, explore caves, and much more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz processor Memory: 400 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX8 compatible video card or APU DirectX: Version 8.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
